mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_USERS_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, PINYIN_CODE, PHONE_NO, ID_NO, SEX, BIRTHDAY, MAILBOX, TITLE_CODE, TITLE_NAME, POSITION, SUMMARY) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_USERS_INFO set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PINYIN_CODE = #{pinyinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, MAILBOX = #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_CODE = #{titleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_NAME = #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, PINYIN_CODE, PHONE_NO, ID_NO, SEX, BIRTHDAY, MAILBOX, TITLE_CODE, TITLE_NAME, POSITION, SUMMARY from V_HIS_USERS_INFO where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, PINYIN_CODE, PHONE_NO, ID_NO, SEX, BIRTHDAY, MAILBOX, TITLE_CODE, TITLE_NAME, POSITION, SUMMARY from V_HIS_USERS_INFO
